llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Deregulation/competition regime acceleration driven by CRA/REINS progress and favorable court outcomes that could lift capex intensity and earnings in semis, autos, and select tech-enabled platforms | Watch CRA/REINS progress and related court outcomes for signs of faster deregulation that could widen pricing power and capex cycles (9W8ZUIBDY)(QRX2HD4X0) | 38%
Up | 0–3 weeks | Tariff pause under a 90-day truce reducing shocks and stabilizing pricing/inventory for retailers | Watch for renewal beyond 90 days or any tariff expansions that would reintroduce volatility and reprice risk assets | 60% (RHXDOHQQX)
Down | 3–6 months | Regime A persists with tariff framework; bear-case: tariff escalations and cross-border frictions raise input costs and pressure margins, dampening capex and earnings in affected sectors | Watch tariff cadence, scope, and cross-border escalation signals that could reprice margins and investment | 28% (RHFWI02JT)(2SJORBV6H)
Down | 0–3 weeks | Near-term pass-through remains uneven with India tariff actions; watch actual implementation dates/scope and price pass-through in tires and apparel | Signals include Navarro signaling 50% tariff on Indian imports (DGG6HXUFZ) and Goodyear tariff costs passing to consumer prices (AJTHKYXQ3) | 22% (DGG6HXUFZ)(AJTHKYXQ3)
